name: Containment Initiative
description: Containment Initiative is a virtual reality co-op shooter for the HTC Vive. Featuring a realistic weapon handling and reloading system, take on the infected horde alone or have a friend play with you by controlling the second player with the mouse and keyboard on the same PC!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better Storage: 6 GB available space
